def create_rest_api(self, api_name): """ Creates a REST API on API Gateway. The default API has only a root resource and no HTTP methods.
:param api_name: The name of the API. This descriptive name is not used in the API path. :return: The ID of the newly created API. """ try: result = self.apig_client.create_rest_api(name=api_name) self.api_id = result['id'] logger.info("Created REST API %s with ID %s.", api_name, self.api_id) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't create REST API %s.", api_name) raise
try: result = self.apig_client.get_resources(restApiId=self.api_id) self.root_id = next( item for item in result['items'] if item['path'] == '/')['id'] except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get resources for API %s.", self.api_id) raise except StopIteration as err: logger.exception("No root resource found in API %s.", self.api_id) raise ValueError from err
return self.api_id
